import React from 'react'; import { Container,Row,Col,Card,Button,Image,Form,InputGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import UpsellItems from '../BiteData/UpsellItems'; const CheckoutPag = ({cartItems}) => { const total = cartItems.reduce((acc, category) => acc + category.price, 0); return ( {/* Text Offers */}
Text offers

Get the latest discounts and offers sent directly to your phone ✨

*By providing your number and clicking the button, you agree to receive recurring auto-dialed marketing SMS... Terms of Service and{' '} Privacy Policy. {/* Express Checkout */}

Express checkout

{/* Right Column - Cart Summary */} {cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

) : ( <>
{cartItems.map((category, index) => (
{category.qty}
{category.title}
2 Pack
${category.price}
))}
{/* Discount Code */} {/* Subtotal */}
Subtotal · {cartItems.reduce((sum, category) => sum + category.qty, 0)} items
${total}
{/* Shipping */}
Shipping ⓘ
Enter shipping address
{/* Total */}
Total USD ${total}
{/* Recurring Note */}

This order has a recurring charge for multiple items.

)} ); }; export default CheckoutPag;
